table module¶

This module contain class Table

Mothods:

add_student get_summary_table

class table.Table(name)¶

Bases: object

This class creates instance of table contain students

Arg:

name: This arg for naming object table

Returns:

name: returns naming object table resultTable: returns table of students

add_student(student_obj)¶

This method for add student to list of students Args:

student_obj: for indication student for add to list

get_summary_table()¶

This method for output of summary data in the form table Returns:

resultTable: result table students
